name: Therm-a-Rest NeoAir Xtherm Max WV Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
NeoAir Xtherm Max WV Sleeping Pad
description: Harness the power of physics to get comfortable. This ultralight sleeping pad suits adventures in all 4 seasons. The new WingLock™ valve is as easy to use as a water bottle cap and 1-way flow means no wasted breaths. The inner construction and a reflective ThermaCapture™ barrier keep you warm on expeditions and winter adventures. Both the reflective barrier and inner cells use lightweight materials that add warmth without compromising weight or packability.Triangular Core Matrix™ and reflective ThermaCapture™ technology provides great comfort, warmth and stability.Shape offers maximum warmth and coverage.WingLock™ valve is 3x faster than conventional valves.1-way airflow is quick and easy to operate even while wearing gloves.Deflates almost instantly for quick and easy packing.Included: Thermarest® pump sack doubles as a storage sack.
